eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.pivoting.rtree.internal

Class Comparators<R,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.pivoting.rtree.internal.Comparators<R,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    R -
    D - 

    public final class Comparators<R,D>
extends Object
    Utility functions asociated with Comparators, especially for use with Selectors and Splitters.

      • ascendingDistance

        public static <T,S extends Geometry> Comparator<Entry<T,S>> ascendingDistance(Rectangle r)

        Returns a comparator that can be used to sort entries returned by search methods. For example:

        search(100).toSortedList(ascendingDistance(r))

        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        S - the entry type
        Parameters:
        r - rectangle to measure distance to
        Returns:
        a comparator to sort by ascending distance from the rectangle

      • ascendingDistance

        public static <R,D> Comparator<Candidate<Object,Double>> ascendingDistance()
        Returns a comparator that can be used to sort elements returned by the distance browsing method that searches for k-nearest neighbors.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the element type (node or entry)
        D - the distance type
        Returns:
        a comparator to sort elements in the priority queue by ascending distance when searching for k-nearest neighbors
